website_summaries.verdict: This kayak is very much geared toward fishing, although this is also fast and stable for 1 or 2 people to just paddle around with.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors, as well as a camouflage pattern
Paddles store when you're not using them
cons: Takes on water more than other models
On the large and heavy side

customer_reviews.title: This kayak is great! Nice a stable and easy to maneuver in ...
customer_reviews.text: This kayak is great! Nice a stable and easy to maneuver in lakes and rivers. Highly recommend this brand and company. Delivery was as advertised. In terms of size, weight, etc...I load this kayak on my vehicle by myself, with the proper kayak rack attachments. When used with a kayak dolly, it is very easy to maneuver on land as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Miller

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the kayak. Stable as a fishing platform and easy to maneuver. The threaded inserts at the rear are useful in attaching a trolling motor mount. Multi-positionable rod holders and two dry wells are well designed and quite useful. Plan on adding additional padding to the seat bottoms if fishing longer than a couple hours. Overall a superb value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak for adult and child
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak for adult and child. Easy to control and paddle. Have done 3 Upper Laguna Madre trips, San Antonio Missions trail and 3 Guadalupe River trips above Canyon Lake and have enjoyed each trip. Expect to get a little wet with waves and light rapids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tandam Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Love the kayak, work great. It's a bit heavier than I expected but I've been using a one man kayak. Very clean and smooth design. There is a nice spot to add a fish finder.
customer_reviews.author: Klein Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with our new kayak , shipped on time (called to ask if it could arrive on our anniversary and they made it happen) lost 7 pounds already cause we can't stay out of it!!!
customer_reviews.author: tina m lambert

customer_reviews.title: well designed with some nice extras
customer_reviews.text: Took it on one trip so far and i like it. Tracks true. Only ding is its large and heavy but its a tandem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Altvater

customer_reviews.title: JMilesCo promptly took care of a minor flaw for me and the kayak is ready for some good times ahead
customer_reviews.text: Received kayak past the expected date however with all Christmas deliveries I understand that. JMilesCo promptly took care of a minor flaw for me and the kayak is ready for some good times ahead! It's a Christmas present so I know my nephew is going to be so excited!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good support from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak. Everything I expected. Stable. Tracks well. Works great with one or two people.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Keith VanArsdol

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it and it came right on time!!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great Kayak!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with no damage. This is our first kayak but everything seems to be good quality. Very stable and surprisingly lightweight for a tandem kayak with extras. We plan on fitting a garmin fish finder as well as other fishing and survival supplies. Plenty of room. Recommended for someone wanting a tandem with fishing capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Jovana Muñoz

customer_reviews.title: Stable and easy to paddle
customer_reviews.text: It is a fine 2 person fishing kayak, lots of rod holders and some extra room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to fish out of with 1 or 2 people ...
customer_reviews.text: Good to fish out of with 1 or 2 people and stable. Most of the screws on the kayak are loose or come loose, so recommend tightening and using a locking nut or glue or other product to keep in place. Now on year 2 and I am replacing the seats. Battens in the seats are broken and forced through the seats. Your butt will sit in water, would have been a good idea to have better placed drain holes in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy K.

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: The 3 articulated fishing rod holders were not included or the two dry bags that sit in the compartments
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tyson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great kayak for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kayak for the money. It comes with everything you need to get out on the water and it works just fine. My son and I have had an awesome time fishing on this kayak.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: holds 2 full grown men very comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of leg room. Lots of rod holder ports. holds 2 full grown men very comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Cristobal T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Kayak- very sturdy in the water, easy to handle. Lots of room. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Johncrab

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tandem kayak that is easy to handle and transport. Comfortable seats and good storage for fishing tackle. Very nice kayak for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L Hattar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak although can be heavy to load after a day on the lake
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Purchase
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fun and versatility in one economic package. Kayak is well manufactured and designed to move smoothly thru the water even with 500+lbs of onboard weight/ Customer Service is top notch as well. Definitely recommend this product to other interested buyers.
customer_reviews.author: NOMOREHP

customer_reviews.title: Uh -to 181kayak sit on top
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to put in the water yet but it seems to be what I want . I'm still waiting on the replacement storage bags as the rings were both broken when I received the kayak and I was told I would be getting replacements but still haven't received them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L.

customer_reviews.title: A great Kayak, I use it by myself and will ...
customer_reviews.text: A great Kayak, I use it by myself and will eventually take my daughter with me. Was worried how it would handle with only one person but it does well and an added bonus I can lay back and take a nap if I wanted to since there is so much extra room. It has hard plastic that doesn't seem to scratch to easily. Seems well built.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Oesterreich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and great delivery. We haven't had them in the water yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Priebe

customer_reviews.title: HORRAY for new fishing adventures!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are SO excited! It was worth the wait. This was our Christmas present to each other. It arrived and is in beautiful condition. Great job shipping! We have a river down the road from us so we are going to walk it (got wheels) down the street to enjoy our river. We both are new to fishing so this is a whole new adventure for us! We normally rent kayaks and go explore but we wanted to step up our game. GREAT customer service, quick responses to questions and most importantly... this KAYAK rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren K. Shealy

customer_reviews.title: good customer service as well
customer_reviews.text: Hasnt been warm enough to hit the lake....but everything I look at, this will be an outstanding kayak. Had a missing part and they were real quick to get one shipped out to me....good customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: William Lyell

customer_reviews.title: excellent product. delivered on time in good shape and ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent product.delivered on time in good shape and just as advertised.haven't caught any fish yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use it yet, but looks well built and has everything promised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy-Happy-Happy.
customer_reviews.text: Have not been in water with the kayak yet.It appears well built and every thing looks as good as described.Was also delivered sooner than expected.I have already ordered a second one.Expecteing delivery tomorrow.Thank you very much,Frank Strickland.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin F.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend that you should purchase Useful 12.5 ft kayak.
customer_reviews.text: Bought useful kayak for my disabled wife to be able to get on the water. Worked well and was able to get her in and out of the front. Kayak came with only one seat and no paddles. I contacted useful and they responded quickly but it took three weeks to get the seat and two paddles. All in all I am happy with the purchase and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Scott I.

customer_reviews.title: unbelievable value for your money.... my ...
customer_reviews.text: unbelievable value for your money....my son bought same kayak from graigs list 600.00 brand new wrapped in plastic.....he has been shopping for some time and came across the BKC...well made and comes with everything all the other ones have.....check out graigs list first
customer_reviews.author: michael markowski

customer_reviews.title: Very stable nice control. It was relatively calm water
customer_reviews.text: Took kayak out first time. Very stable nice control. It was relatively calm water, a few waves generated by passing boats. Kayak handled waves well. Paddles are way short, recommend buy 96' right away. Other then that it's a good kayak for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Marina B.

product_meta.title: BKC UH-TK181 12-foot 5-inch Sit On Top Tandem 2 Person Fishing Kayak with Paddles, Seats, and 7 Fishing Rod Holders included
feature_bullets: THE PERFECT KAYAK FOR OUTDOOR FUN: Our Brooklyn Kayak Company BKC TK181 tandem kayak has extra space to fit 3 - making it ideal for paddling with kids on family adventures and epic fishing trips.

FULLY LOADED ACCESSORIES: Our kayak comes equipped with 2 soft padded seats, 2 adjustable aluminum paddles, 2 waterproof hatches, 6 built in rod holders, 2 paddle parks, and 1 bungee cargo tie down. We have all the accessories you need for your next excursion.

CRAFTED FOR STABILITY: Our Roto Molded single Piece High density polyethylene material is superior to inflatable kayaks and a capable craft on ocean, lake, or river, while supporting up to 595 lbs. Our kayak will remain balanced even in choppy waters or swift currents thanks to its 34-inch beam, and it offers superb stability for fishing in all sorts of conditions.

BUILT-IN FISHING ROD HOLDERS: 4 flush-mount rod holders and 3 articulating rod holders allow you to keep multiple baited lines in the water at once, or just keep the rods out of your way during paddling. Whatever your preference, convenience is always an option.

WATERPROOF STORAGE: Keep all your valuables dry inside the BKC TK181 dual watertight storage hatches. With one for each seat, your gear is always in reach. The rear cargo space with bungee cord will hold all of your fishing stuff and outdoor gear.
